name: YouTube Numix Theme
description: A Dark YouTube Numix Theme to use in Ubuntu. Work best with Numix GTK+ theme. The Original theme (Thanks to Draxx7): https://userstyles.org/styles/92164/youtube-lights-out-a-dark-youtube-theme The Numix GTK+ Theme (Thanks to the Numix Team): https://github.com/numixproject/numix-gtk-theme
